sourcing.instructions: - Cerium Oxide: Available from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces like Sigma-Aldrich.
steps: - Cerium Oxide: Available from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces like Sigma-Aldrich.
1. Weigh 140 g of Cerium Oxide using an analytical balance.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh 140 g of Cerium Oxide using an analytical balance.

steps: 1. Transfer the paste into a ceramic mold measuring 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the paste into a ceramic mold measuring 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches.

steps: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25°C).
cooling.raw_text: 1. Turn off the furnace and allow to cool naturally to room temperature (approximately 25°C).

steps: 1. After cooling, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. After cooling, remove the solid sample from the mold carefully.
